Content.BodyCopy:
Family & Remote Housing - Assistant

Description: This position assists the Family & Remote Housing Manager in all aspects of managing Family & Remote Housing operations. Family Housing is comprised of the University Village married student housing complex located in Rexburg. Remote Housing is comprised of seven satellite housing sites across six states. All properties are run with the same mission to "Create and foster a culture in which students learn and live the principles of Zion in their apartments and homes." The mission is the same for each property, however, all properties are unique one from another. Each one has items that are specific to just that location and require a good amount of detail to manage effectively.

Requirements: Ability to work well without direct supervision. Creatively solve complex problems. Manage multiple projects at a time. Prioritize needs and deadlines. Very strong organization skills. Very strong knowledge of Microsoft Excel and ability to build and maintain spreadsheets. Be an example to tenants.

Assist Family & Remote Housing Manager in the following duties:

-        Setup housing contracts

-        Address tenant concerns

-        Create and implement processes

-        Develop information management system of housing complex specific information (Remote)

-        Address student account issues

-        Develop information packets for Family & Remote Housing

-        Assist on-site Family and Remote Housing managers

-        Assist in manager trainings and meetings

-        Help in the development and implementation of new contracting software program

-        Accompany Family Housing managers on apartment visits

-        Conduct market research

-        Help conduct inspections

-        Help develop curriculum for apartment visits

-        Work with media team to create marketing materials

 

Position Type: Student

Hours: 20/wk

Schedule: Preferably, 4 hour blocks between 8am & 5pm. There may be a need to work evenings occasionally.

Pay: $8.10/hr (possible increases based on proficiency)

 

Skills Needed:

Proficiency with Microsoft Office Suite (especially Excel)

People Skills

Professionalism

Phone etiquette

Customer Service

Organizational skills

Some Accounting skills
